summary: A Racemenu preset for Daenerys on the Breton race, based on Shiva182's for the Nord race.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5][size=4]This file is a Nexus exclusive. If it is found anywhere, including Bethesda.net (as I do have an account there), and is not uploaded by me, it is stolen. Please report any stolen mods you see. :)[/size]


[img]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/selenameeka/Daenerysv3.jpg[/img]
[/size][/b][center][b][size=5][size=6][u]Daenerys[/u][/size][/size][/b][/center]

[size=4]I’ve seen a lot of Daenerys’ on Nexus, but only [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82900/?]one that looked a lot like Daenerys to me[/url]. Unfortunately, it was for the Nord race and didn’t translate to the Breton race well. I like Bretons, so I remade her face and am uploading it with the original author’s, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/39428150/?]Shiva182’s[/url], permission. It's not perfect, but I'm fine with it right now. I hope you like it.
 
Also, her makeup and skin tone are done to the best of my abilities using my own monitor settings, in game settings, and probably a different set of body and texture mods than you, dear user (see below for specifications). On some systems, she might appear to have differently colored makeup, less makeup, more makeup, etc. Also, my game is set up for an ENB.
 
I hope you enjoy! I would love screenshots, especially of the characters you make with this preset![/size][size=3]
[size=4]If there are any issues, please let me know ASAP and include pictures. [i]Pictures are very helpful.

[/i][/size][/size][img]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/selenameeka/comparison.jpg[/img][center][/center]
[size=3]

[size=5][b]Face, Body, Skin, Eyes, Lips, Hair (to get to look almost like mine):[/b]
[list]
[*][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82900/?]Daenerys as a Racemenu Preset[/url] (heavily edited to fit Breton race)[/size]
[*][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72586/?]Pride of Valhalla[/url] (the glittery look for the face, Nilheim version)[/size]
[*][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP Body[/url] (NSFW images, non-pornographic)[/size][list]
[*][size=4]femalebody_1_msn.dds from SRG Female Textures Lightly Muscled Variant Normal Map[/size]
[/list]
[*][size=4]head mesh from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url][/size]
[*][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url] (FemaleEyesHumanEntangled)[/size]
[*][size=4]SG Lip Tints from the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Skin Textures Renewal[/url] mod[/size]
[*][size=4]A merging of both PoV lips and SG lips to get the sheen and to soften the wrinkles around the eyes) (my own edit, not releasing)[/size]
[*][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos[/url][/size][list]
[*][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79735/?]Salt and Wind[/url] retexture to make the hair less perfect and more lived-in, like someone who lives in Skyrim would have.[/size]
[/list]
[*][size=4]Vanilla Brows[/size]
[/list][b]Technical Mods:[/b]
[list]
[*][size=4][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] (for higher resolution tint mask ability)[/size]
[*][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url][/size]
[/list][b]ENBs:[/b]
[list]
[*][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70451/?]Snapdragon Prime ENB[/url] (Currently the Snapdragon profile that’s been heavily edited to my system)[/size]
[/list][/size]
[/size]

[size=5][u][b]Installation:[/b][/u]
[i]Requires Racemenu and SKSE![/i][/size][list=1]
[*][size=5]Open your Data folder in Skyrim[/size]
[*][size=5]Download this file[/size]
[*][size=5]Open Daenerys and copy all the files from the data folder to your Skyrim's data folder[/size]
[/list][size=5][color=#900000]MORE DETAILED INSTRUCTIONS.[/color]
[color=#B45F06]PLEASE READ IF YOU ARE HAVING TROUBLE.[/color]
[color=#38761D]MORE THAN LIKELY YOUR ISSUE WILL BE ANSWERED RIGHT HERE.[/color]
[color=#1C4587][color=#1155Cc]I WILL NOT CONTINUE TO REPOST THE SAME THING OVER AND OVER IN THE COMMENTS.[/color] [/color]
[size=3]Many times the answer is right there in the comments. However to make this easier, I am posting the most common questions and solutions/answers below.

I promise you the basic installation is as easy as those three steps above. :)[/size]

[color=#20124D]Q: There is no data file.[/color]

A: Face presets are .jslot files. The .jslot file must go into the presets file housed within the SKSE folder. The exact path will vary depending on where you have your Skyrim installed, but it is inside the Data folder.

The basic is: [...] Data/SKSE/Plugins/Chargen/Presets.

[color=#20124D]Q: I put the .jslot into the data folder, but the face isn't showing up.[/color]

A: [u]First![/u] The face preset must go into a particular file within the data folder, which is within in the SKSE folder. You need to have Racemenu and SKSE installed. You also cannot make the required file path and not have installed those mods. [size=3]This is because without both mods installed Skyrim cannot read the file.[/size]

[u]Second![/u] Copy [u][i]*all*[/i][/u] of the folders into the Data file folder and keep them in their respective positions. [i]Do not put the .jslot file directly into the data folder by itself.[/i] It won't work if the .jslot is simply hanging out in the Data folder. SKSE cannot pick it up or read it anywhere but in that one special preset folder.

[u]Addendum:[/u] To me, copying and pasting the whole file path is much easier than clicking through all the required folders to put the .jslot in the right place. Not everyone agrees because mistakes can be made and it's good to check an author. That's okay and wise to do! Just remember the .jslot should go into the preset folder within the SKSE folder. :)

[color=#20124D]Q: I followed these instructions, but am still having an issue.[/color]

A: Please leave a comment and explain what is happening.
BE AS [color=#BF9000]DETAILED[/color] AS POSSIBLE. IT HELPS SO MUCH! Pictures help if you can get them, but this is not always possible. [/size][size=5][size=4]
I am not releasing those components that I have personally edited with the skin and lips. Please, [i]don't ask[/i]. [/size]
[/size]

[size=3][size=5][u]Credits:[/u]
[size=3][i]Please visit these mod author's pages to give them endorsements for their hard work! They deserve it! [/i][/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/308756/?]LogRam[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1616045/?]jasperthegnome[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79735/?]Salt and Wind[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1637400/?]dracofish[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72586/?]Pride of Valhalla[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/537675]dimon99[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP Female Body[/url][/size][size=5]
and of course... [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/39428150/?]Shiva182[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82900/?]Daenerys as a Racemenu Preset[/url]!
[/size][/size]
author: selenameeka
